title: Fix List Index Error
description:
## Problem

The `get_element` function crashes with an IndexError when accessing elements that don't exist in the list.

## Requirements

1. Return `None` if the index is out of bounds (negative or >= length)
2. Return `None` if the list is empty or None
3. Return the element at the given index otherwise

## Hints

- Check the list validity before accessing
- Consider both positive and negative index bounds
starter_code:
def solution(data):
    items = data['items']
    index = data['index']
    return items[index]
